hotciv.view

Class GfxConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotciv.view.GfxConstants

  • public class GfxConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    Constants to be accessible by all graphics handling abstractions and coordination mappings. This source code is from the book "Flexible, Reliable Software: Using Patterns and Agile Development" published 2010 by CRC Press. Author: Henrik B Christensen Computer Science Department Aarhus University This source code is provided WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY either expressed or implied. You may study, use, modify, and distribute it for non-commercial purposes. For any commercial use, see http://www.baerbak.com/

      • getXFromColumn

        public static int getXFromColumn(int column)
        return the x pixel position on the graphical display for a tile's column position
        Parameters:
        column - the position of the tile
        Returns:
        the pixel x coordinate corresponding to column

      • getYFromRow

        public static int getYFromRow(int row)
        return the y pixel position on the graphical display for a tile's row position
        Parameters:
        row - the position of the tile
        Returns:
        the pixel y coordinate corresponding to row

      • getColorForPlayer

      • getPositionFromXY

        public static Position getPositionFromXY(int x,
                         int y)
        return a Game Position for a given (x,y) coordinate on a the MapView used to draw the tiles in MiniDraw
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        Returns:
        the position of the tile under (x,y) on the graphical view.
